content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":258412,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔王ランスに抱かれる事を目指している","translatedEnglishLine":"Aiming to be embraced by Demon Lord Rance"},{"lineNumber":258413,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tすずとリセットの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation between Suzu and Reset"},{"lineNumber":258414,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t早雲を好きなすず","translatedEnglishLine":"Suzu, who likes Soun"},{"lineNumber":258415,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t溶岩風呂に居る戯骸","translatedEnglishLine":"Zagai in the lava bath"},{"lineNumber":258416,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t無理矢理、仲間に加わる","translatedEnglishLine":"Forcibly joining the group"},{"lineNumber":258417,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戯骸のおかげでザンスと乱義が少し仲良くなる","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to Zagai, Zans and Rangy become a little closer"},{"lineNumber":258418,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t？？？？","translatedEnglishLine":"????"},{"lineNumber":258419,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tメモ　瀧石保留中","translatedEnglishLine":"Note: Takiishi pending"},{"lineNumber":258420,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t狂った早雲がいる","translatedEnglishLine":"There is a crazed Soun"},{"lineNumber":258421,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tすずが駆け寄るが変化無し","translatedEnglishLine":"Suzu runs up but there's no change"},{"lineNumber":258422,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦うしかない","translatedEnglishLine":"There is no choice but to fight"},{"lineNumber":258423,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tビンタで正気に戻す","translatedEnglishLine":"Slap to bring him back to his senses"},{"lineNumber":258424,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t強く落ち込んでいる早雲","translatedEnglishLine":"Soun is deeply depressed"},{"lineNumber":258425,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tすずが早雲を助け出す","translatedEnglishLine":"Suzu rescues Soun"},{"lineNumber":258426,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t彼女こそ蘭の生まれ変わりと戯骸が言う","translatedEnglishLine":"Zagai says she is the reincarnation of Ran"},{"lineNumber":258427,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t地下湖","translatedEnglishLine":"Underground lake"},{"lineNumber":258428,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t金のオーブを取ります。","translatedEnglishLine":"Take the golden orb."},{"lineNumber":258429,"originalJapaneseLine":"うれしそうな早雲とすず","translatedEnglishLine":"Happy Soun and Suzu"},{"lineNumber":258430,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tネプラカスが現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Neplacas appears"},{"lineNumber":258431,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t大怪獣クエルプランを召喚する","translatedEnglishLine":"Summons the giant monster Queulplan"},{"lineNumber":258432,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tクエルプランが鬼を吸い込んでいく","translatedEnglishLine":"Queulplan swallows the demons"},{"lineNumber":258433,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tすずが吸い込まれそうになる","translatedEnglishLine":"Suzu is about to be swallowed"},{"lineNumber":258434,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦う","translatedEnglishLine":"Fight"},{"lineNumber":258435,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t全員飲み込まれそうになった時","translatedEnglishLine":"When everyone was about to be swallowed"},{"lineNumber":258436,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tエールの力でクエルプランが消える","translatedEnglishLine":"Queulplan disappears by the power of Ale"},{"lineNumber":258437,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t邪魔をされた事で怒ったネプラカス","translatedEnglishLine":"Neplacas is angry for being interfered with"},{"lineNumber":258438,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t襲ってきます\t","translatedEnglishLine":"Attacks"},{"lineNumber":258439,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tネプラカスに勝てない","translatedEnglishLine":"Cannot defeat Neplacas"},{"lineNumber":258440,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tネプラカスはエールに興味を持つ","translatedEnglishLine":"Neplacas becomes interested in Ale"},{"lineNumber":258441,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそこにダークランスが助けに入る","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Rance comes to help there"},{"lineNumber":258442,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tダークランスがネプラカスを追い返す","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Rance drives Neplacas away"},{"lineNumber":258443,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t兄弟達とダークランスの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation between the brothers and Dark Rance"},{"lineNumber":258444,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t仲間に誘うが断られる","translatedEnglishLine":"Invited to join but declined"},{"lineNumber":258445,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t安全地帯に戻りキャンプ","translatedEnglishLine":"Return to a safe zone and camp"},{"lineNumber":258446,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tネプラカスに言われた事が気になる","translatedEnglishLine":"Worried about what Neplacas said"},{"lineNumber":258447,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tザンス、乱義からエールは認められる","translatedEnglishLine":"Ale is recognized by Zans and Rangy"},{"lineNumber":258448,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t日記で最近の冒険の様子","translatedEnglishLine":"Recent adventures described in the diary"},{"lineNumber":258449,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tダークランスいなくなる","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Rance disappears"},{"lineNumber":258450,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t異界ゲートが現れ、ミラクルが誘う","translatedEnglishLine":"A gate to another world appears, and Miracle invites them"},{"lineNumber":258451,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t飲み込まれる","translatedEnglishLine":"Swallowed"},{"lineNumber":258452,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t目を覚ますと異界","translatedEnglishLine":"Wake up in another world"},{"lineNumber":258453,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tミックスが現れ治療して立ち去る","translatedEnglishLine":"Mix appears, heals, and then leaves"},{"lineNumber":258454,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tミックスを捜す事になる","translatedEnglishLine":"They begin to search for Mix"},{"lineNumber":258455,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t異界ポリポリワンと分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"They realize it's the otherworldly Polipoli One"},{"lineNumber":258456,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tミックスを見つけるが","translatedEnglishLine":"They find Mix, but"},{"lineNumber":258457,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t参加はしたくないと言う","translatedEnglishLine":"He says he doesn't want to participate"},{"lineNumber":258458,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tミックスは医師として有名\t","translatedEnglishLine":"Mix is famous as a doctor"},{"lineNumber":258459,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tキャンプで食事","translatedEnglishLine":"Meal at the camp"},{"lineNumber":258460,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t長田君が怪しげな扉を発見","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun discovers a suspicious door"},{"lineNumber":258461,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t異界．ミラクル達の部屋","translatedEnglishLine":"Otherworld: Miracle and their room"},{"lineNumber":258462,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tミラクル登場","translatedEnglishLine":"Miracle appears"},{"lineNumber":258463,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t母と娘の喧嘩","translatedEnglishLine":"Mother and daughter quarrel"},{"lineNumber":258464,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tお茶会","translatedEnglishLine":"Tea party"},{"lineNumber":258465,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tミラクルへの紹介状は無い","translatedEnglishLine":"No letter of introduction to Miracle"},{"lineNumber":258466,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tミラクルからの情報提供","translatedEnglishLine":"Information provided by Miracle"},{"lineNumber":258467,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tＡ．魔王ランスの情報","translatedEnglishLine":"A. Information on Demon Lord Rance"},{"lineNumber":258468,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tＢ．異界の話","translatedEnglishLine":"B. Story of the other world"},{"lineNumber":258469,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tＣ．ミラクルの年齢","translatedEnglishLine":"C. Miracle's age"},{"lineNumber":258470,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tミラクルからの情報２","translatedEnglishLine":"More information from Miracle 2"},{"lineNumber":258471,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tＡ．魔王の子達について","translatedEnglishLine":"A. About the children of the Demon Lord"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスに抱かれる事を目指している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aiming to be embraced by Demon Lord Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すずとリセットの会話
早雲を好きなすず
溶岩風呂に居る戯骸
無理矢理、仲間に加わる
戯骸のおかげでザンスと乱義が少し仲良くなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to Zagai, Zans and Rangy become a little closer

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモ　瀧石保留中
狂った早雲がいる
すずが駆け寄るが変化無し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suzu runs up but there's no change

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦うしかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no choice but to fight

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビンタで正気に戻す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Slap to bring him back to his senses

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強く落ち込んでいる早雲
すずが早雲を助け出す
彼女こそ蘭の生まれ変わりと戯骸が言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zagai says she is the reincarnation of Ran

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下湖
金のオーブを取ります。
うれしそうな早雲とすず
ネプラカスが現れる
大怪獣クエルプランを召喚する
クエルプランが鬼を吸い込んでいく
すずが吸い込まれそうになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suzu is about to be swallowed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦う
全員飲み込まれそうになった時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When everyone was about to be swallowed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールの力でクエルプランが消える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Queulplan disappears by the power of Ale

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 邪魔をされた事で怒ったネプラカス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Neplacas is angry for being interfered with

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 襲ってきます
ネプラカスに勝てない
ネプラカスはエールに興味を持つ
そこにダークランスが助けに入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Rance comes to help there

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスがネプラカスを追い返す
兄弟達とダークランスの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between the brothers and Dark Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間に誘うが断られる
安全地帯に戻りキャンプ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return to a safe zone and camp

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスに言われた事が気になる
ザンス、乱義からエールは認められる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ale is recognized by Zans and Rangy

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日記で最近の冒険の様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Recent adventures described in the diary

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスいなくなる
異界ゲートが現れ、ミラクルが誘う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A gate to another world appears, and Miracle invites them

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飲み込まれる
目を覚ますと異界
ミックスが現れ治療して立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mix appears, heals, and then leaves

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミックスを捜す事になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They begin to search for Mix

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界ポリポリワンと分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They realize it's the otherworldly Polipoli One

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミックスを見つけるが
参加はしたくないと言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He says he doesn't want to participate

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミックスは医師として有名
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mix is famous as a doctor

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャンプで食事
長田君が怪しげな扉を発見
異界．ミラクル達の部屋
ミラクル登場
母と娘の喧嘩
お茶会
ミラクルへの紹介状は無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No letter of introduction to Miracle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルからの情報提供
Ａ．魔王ランスの情報
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A. Information on Demon Lord Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｂ．異界の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: B. Story of the other world

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｃ．ミラクルの年齢
ミラクルからの情報２
Ａ．魔王の子達について
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A. About the children of the Demon Lord

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
